@description.body:

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
A group widget arranges several widgets visual. Example Here is a little example of how to use the widget. 

   var title = new qx.ui.mobile.form.Title("Group");
   var list = new qx.ui.mobile.list.List();
   var group = new qx.ui.mobile.form.Group([list]);
   this.getRoot.add(title);
   this.getRoot.add(group);

This example creates a group and adds a list to it.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: showBorder {Boolean?} initial value of the property showBorder.
@param.description: initial value of the property showBorder.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@description.body: Defines whether a border should drawn around the group.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.
